content.raw:
Thank you for the quick responses.  

This issue was not limited to the Building Editor "import".  All of the file browsers were affected.

I was able to track down the root cause to settings in my ".config/Trolltech.conf".  In particular, having "style=GTK+" in Trolltech.conf broke the file browsers.  Removing it fixed the issue.

As a side note, the Building Editor "import" functionality is working fine for me after the configuration changes.

Thanks again.  I'm very impressed by how quickly you guys responded to my original comment.  Kudos!
content.html:
Thank you for the quick responses.

This issue was not limited to the Building Editor "import". All of the file browsers were affected.

I was able to track down the root cause to settings in my ".config/Trolltech.conf". In particular, having "style=GTK+" in Trolltech.conf broke the file browsers. Removing it fixed the issue.

As a side note, the Building Editor "import" functionality is working fine for me after the configuration changes.

Thanks again. I'm very impressed by how quickly you guys responded to my original comment. Kudos!
